items.title: KNX Location
items.description: A KNX location instance, which can be any specific type of location (Site, Building, Floor, etc.).

oneOf.title: Site
oneOf.description: A top-level location entity, which may contain buildings and site segments.

allOf.title: Site Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Site.

oneOf.title: Building
oneOf.description: A structure within a site that may contain rooms, floors, or other spaces.

allOf.title: Building Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Building.

oneOf.title: Floor
oneOf.description: A level or story within a building.

allOf.title: Floor Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Floor.

oneOf.title: Room
oneOf.description: A physical or logical room within a building or floor.

allOf.title: Room Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Room.

oneOf.title: Room Segment
oneOf.description: A subdivided segment of a room.

allOf.title: Space
allOf.description: A general space in a building that may contain floors or rooms.

allOf.title: Space Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Space.

allOf.title: Room Segment Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#RoomSegment.

oneOf.title: Space
oneOf.description: A general space in a building that may contain floors or rooms.

allOf.title: Space Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Space.

oneOf.title: Site Segment
oneOf.description: A subdivided part of a site, typically containing one or more buildings.

allOf.title: Site Segment Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#SiteSegment.

oneOf.title: Outside
oneOf.description: An external or outdoor area linked to a location.

allOf.title: Outside Definition
allOf.description: Defines the structure and relationships specific to loc#Outside.
